nodes.text: Would you like an apple?
No... thank you for the offer, but no.
Hungry? Here is an apple I picked up just for you.
JUST for me? How thoughtful of you.
<whisper> I've got a little present for you. You can wear it when you are out of your disguise.
It's very pretty. Thank you, Shawn.
Here's a little gift I picked up for you...
A necklace? You're offering me beads?
Sorry, but I really don't want them. I... don't wear beads.
I found a book I think you might be interested in... I don't know what it's about, but it's definitely strange.
There's something really unpleasant about this book. I don't know in what language it is written, but I don't think anyone should read it. I think it's Evil.
You could give it to the Librarian, but personally, I feel like that book is very dangerous. It should be destroyed.
I wanted to give you a kiss - some Dryad's Kiss wine. Would you like it?
<whisper> Please Shawn, someone might overhear you.
What - you don't want other people to know that I love you?
But I'm... You're... oh. I guess it isn't a problem, is it?
Thank you so much. I'll save it for a special occasion for the two of us to share.
I wanted to give you a kiss - some Dryad's Kiss wine. Would you like it?
You realize that this is a very valuable wine that you are offering to me?
Your smile is worth more to me than this bottle of wine.
<kiss> You are so sweet!
I have some very special wine. I wanted to share it with you.
<blush> You are offering me this as a gift? That's a rare and coveted vintage. I'm sorry, but it's not a good idea. I... don't drink wine.
Would you like this bottle of wine? It's the good stuff.
Thank you, but I don't think it's a good idea for me to drink here at the school right now.
Maybe later?
Maybe...
You're giving this to me? Thank you, but I don't really drink.
I found this really nice wine and I'd like you to have it.
No, thank you. It's kind of you to offer it to me though. Maybe we could share a glass sometime.
I'll look forward to that time then.
You're giving this to me? Uh... Thank you, but I don't really drink.
I found a book that expresses how I feel for you... It's full of love.
That's so sweet of you! I'll treasure this book. Thank you so much!
I found a book you might like to have - it's a book of Love Ballads.
<blush> Thank you... But I don't... you should keep it. It's not, well, maybe someone else will want it.
I'd like you to have this ring. It's a token of my love for you. You are my 'One and Only.'
Shawn, this isn't the place for such a thing. We should talk sometime in private.
Would you meet me after curfew in the Tower Garden?
I can't wait, but I guess I'll have to for your sake.
Thomas, I'd like you to have this gift as a sign of my love. It's the "One and Only" ring, and that's what I'd like you to be. I love you.
Shawn, you'll always be my One and Only. <hug>
How would you like to be my "One and Only" - and here's the ring to prove it.
You're kidding, right? That seems like a really silly thing to do considering that we don't know one another at all.
Oh, sure... just kidding.
I brought you a beautiful flower for a beautiful person.
<blush> Thank you. That's so sweet of you.
I brought you a gift. I thought you might like a rose.
Um... er... mmm... that is nice of you, but I really don't think I want that. Um... thanks.
Here are the gems I got by defeating the stone Golem in the dungeon. I'd like you to have them.
These are beautiful... and probably magical, judging by the way they glow. They must be very valuable. You should keep them.
But I want you to have them. Think of them as a souvenir to show that I am a hero, too.
Oh, Shawn... you'll always be my hero.
Here are the gems I took from the golem down in the dungeon. Would you like to have them?
They look very valuable - and, judging from the way they glow, they are probably magical. I'm sorry, I can't take those from you. Thank you, but no.
Here's a ring I came across in my explorations. It glows with magical light - just like you glow from the light within you. Would you wear it for me?
Oh, Shawn, you are so romantic. I'll be happy to wear it. I'll think of you whenever I see it. Of course, I think of you all the time now, anyway.
I found this magical ring. Would you like to have it?
You want to give me a magical ring? Thank you for the offer, Shawn, but I can't accept your gift. It's just... not right for me to take it.
I found this magical ring and I'd like you to have it. I hope it will keep you safe when we're not together.
I've never met anyone like you before, Shawn. You make me happy whenever I'm around you. I'll be happy to wear it for you.
I found this magical ring - do you want it? It's yours.
What? Why? It makes no sense for you to give me a valuable ring. You don't even know me.

options.text: Hand Thomas the "Way of the Paladin" Book

nodes.text: Here's a gift for you that I know you will really like - It's all about Paladins.
This is.. this is so very thoughtful of you! Thank you so much.
I found this book lying around in one of the secret passageways and I thought that you might like to have it.
It's... it's a book about Paladins! Thank you. I really appreciate this. You are very kind to give this to me.

nodes.message: Reinvoking this to see if the player can offer another gift.
